title: Task
description: Schema for representing a task object

_id.description: Unique identifier for the task - Only unique within each task tier

isLms.description: Indicates whether the task is related to Last Man Standing (LMS)

wikiLink.description: URL linking to the wiki page providing more information about the task

wikiImage.description: URL linking to an image representing the task from the wiki

assetImage.description: Name of the asset image for the task

colLogData.description: Data used to check the task has been completed via the users Collection Log

category.description: Category to which the task belongs in the Collection Log

logName.description: Name of the task entry in the Collection Log

include.description: Items to include when checking the Collection Log for this task

exclude.description: Items to exclude when checking the Collection Log for this task

logCount.description: Number of items to check for in the Collection Log
